parameters: As you enter the town, a young Goblin walks up to you.
She's clearly frightened by you, but is being brave.
Monster
Goblin Girl
"Y-You're not allowed here, h-human!"
"Go b-back or I'll h-have to... f-fight you!"
Attack the Goblin Girl or spare her?
Attack
Spare
Attack
The Goblin girl drops her weapon and runs.
Hearing the commotion, a male Goblin arrives.
Upon seeing you, he attacks.
Spare
Monster
Willow
"R-Really? You're not... gonna hurt me?"
"You'll leave us in peace??"
"...I guess some humans aren't so bad."
"My name's Willow, in case I see you again..."
You are approached by angry Goblins.
Clearly they didn't take kindly to you killing their friend.
You've defeated all 5 of the Goblins!
Quick! Run before more show up!
You approach the Goblin town, wondering what to do.
2 male Goblins approach you, with Willow trailing behind.
The males seem suspicious of you.
Willow's face lights up upon the sight of you.
Monster
Willow
"It's you!"
"Oh goodness, I was worried he'd sent another!"
"Guys, it's ok."
"This human is the one who spared my life."
The guards lower their arms slowly, still suspicious.
You nervously explain to everyone your predicament.
You hope they can give you some advice on what to do next.
After hearing your story, Willow speaks up.
Monster
Willow
"Honestly, I think there's a way we can help."
"At the same time, you'll be helping us!"
"You see, we're not treated that well here."
"We're archers by nature..."
Monster
Willow
"But well, you see, the Dragon wants frontmen."
"But then he never trained us to do that!"
"We want to rebel, but have no one to back us."
"Convince the Mayor we can be of use, please?"
Monster
Willow
"I don't want to fight you..."
*looks at your readied weapon*
"I-I guess I have no choice. GUARDS!"
Monster
Female Goblin
"You monster!
"Do you know how many families you've hurt!?"
"And now you plan to wipe all of us out!?"
"I WILL NEVER LET THAT HAPPEN!"
You've killed the Goblins that tried to attack.
You watch everyone else flee their homes.
You hope this was enough to satisfy Nebula.
You have 22 Hours until the Blood Moon.
You find Willow in the towers of her village.
She seems to be instructing a class on archery.
You sneak up behind her and grab her shoulders.
She squeals and in one effortless movement, pins you down.
Monster
Willow
"O-oh! I am so so sorry! I thought..."
*She perks up, and starts laughing*
"But you got me good, hehehe!"
*She giggles like a child. It's cute in a way."
Monster
Willow
*Willow then turns to the class*
"Alright, that's enough for the day, everyone!"
"Remember to bring your homework tomorrow!"
*She turns back to you."
Monster
Willow
"Why exactly are you here?"
"Are you in trouble? Do you need an archer?"
"I am also trained to mend wounds, if needed."
"Soo... what's up?"
You stop her and explain that you just wanted to hang out.
Noting her puzzled look, you explain.
Hanging out like, doing fun stuff with friends.
Or you could just sit and talk to each other about life.
Monster
Willow
"Uhhh... isn't 'fun' only for kids, though?"
"...And who would want to talk to ME? Heh..."
*She stands awkwardly in front of you."
*You realize she's been hurt or misled or both*
You ask her to just try it, only for a day.
She nods and looks at her feet, trying to hide fear.
Yep, she's definitely been hurt.
Probably best to leave it be until she knows you more.
You offer to give her a ride to the main town, to show her.
She shivers, but gets on the horse with you.
She's incredibly afraid, but bravely fights through it.
Your admiration of her grows with each passing second.
As you walk through the town, she slowly relaxes.
She's starting to look at you different.
The same happens to you, though you don't know what it is.
Then she grabs your arm and leans into your body, yawning.
Monster
Willow
"Thank you for this wonderful day"
"You're definitely not like other humans..."
*yawn*
"I need to head home and rest now."
You take her to the stables and mount up.
Riding back to the camp, you finally notice the sun setting.
You had been so happy spending time with Willow...
You'd honestly forgotten how much time had passed.
You returned her to her camp.
You told one of the guards there to please see her home.
You explained she's just tired from her fun day off.
He looked at you, seemingly surprised, but escorts her back.
You decide to return at a later date to check up on her.
Before you enter the town, you hear something in the bushes.
You start to draw your sword.
Before you can, though, a small figure jumps out at you.
All you see is green for a moment as the figure... hugs you?
Monster
Willow
"YOU'RE BACK!"
"I was soo worried you wouldn't return!"
"That mean Mayor has been at it again."
"We could really use your help with this."
Monster
Willow
"Basically, he's been sending guards here."
"The guards then harrass us, take our food..."
"Say nasty things about us..."
"And they don't even DO anything! Lazy bums!"
People4
Unknown Guard
"Hey! You there! YOU'RE the adventurer guy!"
"Hey, everyone! Look at this dude!"
"He's chatting up an ugly Goblin!"
"Does he even KNOW if it's a girl? HAHAHAHA!"
Cool, racist AND homophobic.
You can either calm him down...
Or take him and his lackeys out.
What're you going to do?
Calm Him Down
Beat him Up
Calm Him Down
You drop your sword and its sheathe to the ground.
The soldier looks at you, confused.
You explain you're not here to fight, but will if necessary.
People4
Unknown Guard
"No... fight? What in the world kind of..."
"Wait, that's right. You're the diplomat guy."
"So if we hurt you..."
"Your monster lackeys will turn on us!"
Suddenly, two more guards come into view. They look drunk.
Also, they looked fearful of you.
The group books it to the stables and you hear hooves.
Say what you will, the guards had a bit of sense in them.
Willow looks at you with admiration.
Beat him Up
As you charge at cp'n jerk, you see two more soldiers.
Willow stares at you wide-eyed as you leave the scene.
The jerks are very much alive, but dispatched nonetheless.
You kneel to her level and try to comfort the innocent girl.
Monster
Willow
"Like, I knew you were a fighter and all but..."
"I've never seen something so... brutal."
"And they're not even dead. You spared their lives."
"I'm not used to seeing a battle like that."
Monster
"Just... keep the fighting to a minimum, ok?"
"I don't want to see you hurting anyone else."
"Unless, you know... there's no choice."
"Anyway..."
Monster
Willow
"You saved me... and helped us all!"
"Wow... I don't know what to say..."
"Thank you, sweetness."
Your heart flutters a bit at the word "sweetness."
You realize you may actually have a crush on Willow.
Interspecies relationships were definitely rare...
You decide you'll ride it out and see what happens.
You should go home for now and get some rest...
Definitely stop by again when you get the chance.
You once again return to the Goblin town.
Something, though... seems off.
The air was quiet and no guards were at their posts.
You venture further into the main area.
You hear crying in the distance. A LOT of it.
The sound of dozens seemingly in mourning.
Your heart beats faster.
PLEASE let it not be Willow!
You come across a funeral procession.
It's a single-file line, with each one stomping in rhythm.
It is loud as drums, and you can hear several wails.
You spot Willow near the back, balling.
She spots you, and runs into your arms.
Her sobs are the loudest of them all.
You try to comfort her, and when she's a bit calmer...
You ask her who passed.
Monster
Willow
M-My... *sniffles* My dad...
Th-The Ch-Chieftain...
He...
He's gone! *wails and throws herself on you*
You'd never met her father, you realize.
Willow had also never mentioned anything about him.
You ask what he was like.
Monster
Willow
"He... umm... well, we didn't talk much..."
"Not after I grew up and... umm..."
"Anyway, he was close to me during childhood."
"I guess I'm not mourning HIM as much as THAT."
You wonder what happened to make them separate.
Will you push for more information or let it go?
Push for More Info
Let it go
Push for More Info
Monster
Willow
"Just... something happened to me, ok?"
"Dad disowned me after that."
"Called me 'dirtied and useless'"
Let it go
Monster
Willow
*She looks at you.*
"You... aren't going to ask me what happened?"
"You don't... care?"
"Like... it doesn't matter?"
You wrap one arm around her and confirm her suspicions.
You state that all that matters is here, now, you and her.
She rests her head against your shoulder.
She stares at the waning crowd.
Monster
Willow
*She sits in silence for a bit before speaking*
"I... I should go."
"I really appreciate you being here to talk."
"And... just in general, too."
Monster
Willow
"You know, umm...."
"I like you so, so much."
"Not as just a friend..."
"But like, more, you know?"
Is she asking you out?
Monster
Willow
"Ummm...."
*It suddenly bursts out from her*
"WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO ON A DATE WITH ME?"
*She hides her face, apparently expecting a no*
Say yes or no?
(This will not affect any other relationships)
Yes
No
Yes
Monster
Willow
"Y-you will?"
"I HAVE TO GET BACK TO THE FUNERAL!"
"GOODBYE AND PICK ME UP TOMORROW OK?"
No
Monster
Willow
*She looks up at you, fear turning to fury*
"Well, I guess I'll have to hunt you down!"
"AND FORCE YOU TO DATE ME!"
Her squeaky voice and small stature makes you chuckle.
She giggles a bit... then you both burst out laughing.
You respond that you'll pick her up in a few days' time.
You arrive at the Goblin Camp and go up to a guard there.
You ask him the location of Willow's home.
He points at a small tent and tells you to go quick.
Your sweet Willow awaits you.
You enter the tent, and wait for your eyes to adjust.
As she comes into view, you see Willow has dressed up.
She's in a beautiful red dress, with ruby slippers.
Diamond sequins glisten in the candlelight.
Monster
Willow
"I-I hope you like what you see..."
*She notices your stare*
"I guess that's a yes, hehe!."
*She puts her hand in yours*
You take a stroll through the town and she shows you around.
Other Goblins stop and stare at the two of you.
You notice Willow getting nervous at all the stares.
You've been barely noticing them all along.
All that matters to you, right now, is this moment.
Where her smile and beauty lights up your world.
All that matters is you and her.
You and...
The world disappears as you pull her in and kiss her.
One simple moment feels like eternity, and yet...
As the two of you pull away...
It doesn't feel like that enternity is enough.
Monster
Willow
*She babbles breathlessly for a bit*
...My first real kiss.
That was... amazing...
The two of you sit by a campfire for a while.
You stare into each others' eyes, and kiss once more.
It's time to head home.
Before you approach the town, you hear yelling.
Suddenly, an arrow flies at you!
It came from the guard post... but why?
You put your arms up to try and block whatever is next.
More arrows come flying at you.
You can't see where the guard is...
All you can tell is that he's in the tower.
You yell up to him to try and get him to stop.
Unseen Goblin Guard
"NO! You are not taking Willow from me!"
"Not a disgusting HUMAN like you! NEVER!"
*He continues to fire arrows at you*
"I LIKED HER FIRST!"
It's too risky to move forward, or back.
Forward could mean provoking more aggression.
Back would mean exposing yourself too much.
Suddenly, you hear what sounds like a... war cry?
Monster
Willow
"AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"
*She crashes on top of the guard*
"NEVER! EVER! SHOOT! AN! ALLY!"
*She takes his bow and snaps it in half.*
Monster
Willow
"You're dismissed."
"I'll make sure they know you're a traitor."
*She hauls the guard to his feet and...*
*She throws him off the tower.*
You run to the camp to make sure the guard is alive.
You see him being escorted away by two other Goblins.
Willow watches him with a cold look on her face.
She then turns to you in concern.
Monster
Willow
"Are you hurt? He didn't hit you, right?"
"You SURE he didn't hit you?"
"Usually the pain doesn't show up right away."
"I'll do an inspection just in case."
You laugh at how ridiculous this is. Willow saved YOU.
Not only that, she was so confident just then!
A natural leader, and takes care of those she loves.
Her father was a fool to disown her.
Monster
Willow
"Ok, no injuries. But you can't stay, sorry."
"I have to go make sure this guy is locked up."
"And then there's the questioning..."
"And of course paperwork and all that."
Monster
Willow
"...Anyway, you can't stay."
"I'll talk to you another time."
"Oh, and... sweetheart?"
"...I'm glad you're OK."
As she runs off, you wonder why she's so shy around you.
When she's in work mode, her confidence shines.
How can you get her to show such confidence in life?
You ponder this question as you ride away.
You return to Willow's home once again.
This time, you carry some extra items on you.
Maybe today, she'll show some courage.
You're risking a lot here, but to you, it's worth it.
It's early. The sun has just risen.
Willow is sleeping in her tent.
You quietly place a blindfold over her eyes.
Then... You grab her.
Willow snaps awake and screams at you.
You hold her arms and legs just enough to keep her still.
You're trying your best not to hurt her.
Suddenly, you feel a sharp pain on the front of your skull.
Willow has headbutted you. She does it again. And again.
Your hold loosens. She frees herself.
Your vision is blurry, but you can tell her blindfold is on.
Then you feel sharp steel at your throat.
Monster
Willow
"Do that again, and I'll cut you ear to ear."
"...Sweetheart."
"And yes, I know it's you. Now, the question:"
You smile and respond with your own question.
Where does all that confidence go when you're not on duty?
The blade is removed from your neck.
The last thing you see before passing out is Willow's smile.
You wake up a little while later.
Willow is sitting next to you, tending your head wound.
She sees you awake and kisses your cheek.
Monster
Willow
"You're really dumb sometimes, you know that?"
"I could have killed you."
"All this just for some confidence?"
"That's probably the most stupid idea ever."
You both laugh, and you stay with her a few days to recover.
Monster
Willow
"Look sweetheart, I know you're seeing others."
"It's OK with me, really."
"I know your heart is with me as well."
"Have fun, love! We'll talk again soon."
Monster
Willow
"Look sweetheart, I know you're seeing others."
"It's OK with me, really."
"I know your heart is with me as well."
"Have fun, love! We'll talk again soon."
Monster
Willow
"Look sweetheart, I know you're seeing others."
"It's OK with me, really."
"I know your heart is with me as well."
"Have fun, love! We'll talk again soon."
Monster
Willow
"Look sweetheart, I know you're seeing others."
"It's OK with me, really."
"I know your heart is with me as well."
"Have fun, love! We'll talk again soon."
Monster
Willow
"Look, love, I know you want to see others."
"It's OK with me, really."
"I know your heart is with me as well."
"Have fun, dear! We'll talk again soon."
